text:
在新卡外遊優惠組合到期前，如儲值額達$42，系統將會自動續購「30日/本地數據服務組合 FUP 60GB」。( 續購功能可於賬戶「主頁 > 設定」內開/關)
4. 增值並延長有效期
如想繼續使用SoSIM，請於登入賬戶後按「增值」為儲值卡增值，即可延長有效期及購買服務。
瀏覽網站 [redacted_url]了解更多！
[查詢：[redacted_url]]
trans:
Before the expiry of the new roaming offer package, if the top-up amount reaches $42, the system will automatically renew the "30-day/Local Data Service Package FUP 60GB". (Renewal function can be enabled/disabled in the account "Homepage > Settings")
4. Top-up and Extend Validity
If you wish to continue using SoSIM, please log in to your account and click "Top-up" to add value to your prepaid card, which will extend its validity and allow you to purchase services.
Visit the website [redacted_url] for more details!
[Inquiry: [redacted_url]]
